alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Delaware; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 10:59PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHENANGO...TIOGA... BROOME...AND DELAWARE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1059 PM EDT, a band of heavy snow was over Union Center, or over Endicott moving east at 45 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Binghamton, Vestal, Johnson City, Endicott, Kirkwood, Conklin, Maine, Sanford, Deposit and Port Dickinson. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 7. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 66 and 84. Interstate 88 between 1 and 7. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
